brand_values.brand_promise: Make customers’ lives better and easier every day through selection, convenience, and reliable fulfillment.
differentiators: Scale of selection and marketplace breadth
Integrated ecosystem (Prime, devices, digital content, AWS)
non_negotiables: High bar for speed, reliability, and operational execution
Clarity and usefulness over decorative messaging

psychographics.lifestyle: Time-constrained consumers and households optimizing for convenience, value, and dependable delivery; digitally native shoppers and subscribers
psychographics.behavior: High-frequency browsing and purchase behavior; subscription-driven usage patterns (Prime) and repeat purchasing

tone_donts: Abstract brand manifesto language in performance contexts

logo.primary_logo: amazon wordmark with the curved arrow/smile
logo.usage_rules: High-contrast placements; keep clear space; avoid cluttered backgrounds that reduce legibility; do not distort or recolor in ways that reduce recognizability.
logo.lockup_behavior: Top-left or bottom-left in performance placements; centered on brand moments; maintains consistent clear space
logo.safe_area: Minimum padding equals at least the height of the lowercase 'a' around the logo

color_system.color_usage_rules: White-first UI surfaces with black typography; orange accent for calls-to-action and highlights; deep navy/blue used in ecosystem sub-brands and UI contexts.

typography.secondary_font: Sans-serif with heavier weights for CTA emphasis

layout_principles.white_space_ratio: Moderate to generous in brand moments; denser in retail-performance layouts
layout_principles.image_vs_text_balance: Benefit-led, product/service-led; text supports quick scanning
layout_principles.cta_placement: Prominent and consistent; near primary message (often right side or lower area depending on format)
layout_principles.alignment: Functional alignment (left-aligned copy blocks; centered hero for brand spots)

style.camera_feel: Clean, contemporary, approachable; clarity over moodiness
style.pose_guidelines: Natural, task-based actions; real-life usage moments; expressions read as practical and optimistic
style.casting_attitude: Inclusive, everyday relatability; diverse representation reflecting broad customer base

technical.lighting: High-key or evenly lit; minimal harsh shadows; product clarity prioritized
technical.color_grading: Neutral with slightly warm highlights; brand orange used as accent rather than global grade

preferred_locations: Simple studio or seamless for product clarity

product_presentation.hero_visibility: High; product/service benefit must be immediately clear
product_presentation.styling_approach: Everyday wardrobe; minimal distraction; focus on use case

motion_rules.transitions: Clean cuts; UI-like overlays; simple wipes or fades when needed

visual_dos: Use orange accents sparingly for CTAs
Show real use cases and benefits
visual_donts: Excessive decorative design that hides information
Logo over faces or key product details

materials: Iconography and trust signals (ratings, shipping badges)
interactive_elements: Badges for delivery speed and Prime eligibility
retail.soundscape: Neutral; functional; short confirmation tones in apps/devices

digital.tone_adjustment: Performance-first on retail surfaces; warmer and more narrative for Prime Video/Amazon Originals and brand films

platform_behavior.Instagram: Short-form benefit stories, creator-style demos, quick product highlights
platform_behavior.Website: High-utility browsing and purchase flows; trust and speed signals above the fold
platform_behavior.Newsletter: Deal-forward with clear categories; short headlines; prominent CTAs

print.paper: Not primary; when used, clean uncoated or semi-matte stock
print.cover_rules: High legibility headline + clear hero visual; minimal text clutter

logo_misuse_examples: Low-contrast logo placements on busy photography
